name: The Secret of Gillwood
description: The gods don´t hear the prayers of Gillwood, so it’s now up to you to find out why! The Secret of Gillwood is an single player game with a small open world set in a dark and mysterious world. The player takes control over the most faithful Guardian of the gods.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64x) Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8300 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT710 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 Series 2GB Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse, headset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10  (64x) Processor: Intel Core i7 4770 3,4 GHz / AMD A10-7800 Quad-Core 3.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB / Nvidia GTX 760 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse, headset
